## AnimatedExtrusionHandler class

Handles animated extrusion effect of the buildings in \[\[MapView\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class AnimatedExtrusionHandler 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(m\_mapView)](./harp-mapview.animatedextrusionhandler._constructor_.md) |  | Creates an \[\[AnimatedExtrusionHandler\]\] in \[\[MapView\]\]. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [duration](./harp-mapview.animatedextrusionhandler.duration.md) |  | number | Duration of the building's extrusion in milliseconds |
|  [enabled](./harp-mapview.animatedextrusionhandler.enabled.md) |  | boolean | Animate the extrusion of the buildings if set to <code>true</code>. |
|  [forceAnimatedExtrusion](./harp-mapview.animatedextrusionhandler.forceanimatedextrusion.md) |  | boolean \| undefined | Checks whether animated extrusion effect was forcibly turned off/on in \[\[MapView\]\] |
|  [forceAnimatedExtrusionDuration](./harp-mapview.animatedextrusionhandler.forceanimatedextrusionduration.md) |  | number \| undefined | Returns <code>animatedExtrusionDuration</code> value that was set in \[\[MapView\]\]. |
|  [forceEnabled](./harp-mapview.animatedextrusionhandler.forceenabled.md) |  | boolean | If <code>forceEnabled</code> is set to <code>true</code> then <code>animateExtrusion</code> and <code>animateExtrusionDuration</code> values from \[\[extrudedPolygonTechnique\]\] will be ignored in \[\[Tile\]\] and <code>AnimatedExtrusionHandler.enabled</code> with <code>AnimatedExtrusionHandler.duration</code> will be used |
|  [isAnimating](./harp-mapview.animatedextrusionhandler.isanimating.md) |  | boolean | Is <code>true</code> if any extrusion handlers are currently animating. |
|  [zoomDirection](./harp-mapview.animatedextrusionhandler.zoomdirection.md) |  | number | Returns direction of the last zoom event. Zoom in - positive value, zoom out - negative value |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [add(tileHandler)](./harp-mapview.animatedextrusionhandler.add.md) |  | Adds an \[\[AnimatedExtrusionTileHandler\]\] to \[\[AnimatedExtrusionHandler\]\] |
|  [find(tileKeys)](./harp-mapview.animatedextrusionhandler.find.md) |  | Returns first \[\[AnimatedExtrusionTileHandler\]\] existed from the list of \[\[Tile\]\]s |
|  [removeTile(tile)](./harp-mapview.animatedextrusionhandler.removetile.md) |  | Removes tile from the list subscribed for extrusion ratio updates |
